SNMPv3 Applications
contents.zh-CHS: SNMPv3应用程序

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: IANA Note
contents.zh-CHS: IANA注释

contents.text: Due to a clerical error in the assignment of the snmpModules in this memo, this RFC provides the corrected number assignments for this protocol. This memo obsoletes RFC 2263.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于本备忘录中snmpModules分配的文书错误，本RFC提供了本协议的正确编号分配。本备忘录废除了RFC 2263。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo describes five types of SNMP applications which make use of an SNMP engine as described in [RFC2271]. The types of application described are Command Generators, Command Responders, Notification Originators, Notification Receivers, and Proxy Forwarders.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录描述了使用[RFC2271]中所述SNMP引擎的五种类型的SNMP应用程序。所描述的应用程序类型包括命令生成器、命令响应器、通知发起者、通知接收者和代理转发器。

contents.text: This memo also defines MIB modules for specifying targets of management operations, for notification filtering, and for proxy forwarding.
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录还定义了MIB模块，用于指定管理操作的目标、通知筛选和代理转发。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text:
1 Overview .....................................................    2
1.1 Command Generator Applications .............................    3
1.2 Command Responder Applications .............................    3

1.5 Proxy Forwarder Applications ...............................    3
2 Management Targets ...........................................    5
1. Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 概述

contents.text: This document describes five types of SNMP applications:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档介绍五种类型的SNMP应用程序：

contents.text: - Applications which initiate SNMP Get, GetNext, GetBulk, and/or Set requests, called 'command generators.'
contents.zh-CHS: - 启动SNMP Get、GetNext、GetBulk和/或Set请求的应用程序，称为“命令生成器”

contents.text: - Applications which respond to SNMP Get, GetNext, GetBulk, and/or Set requests, called 'command responders.'
contents.zh-CHS: - 响应SNMP Get、GetNext、GetBulk和/或Set请求的应用程序称为“命令响应程序”

contents.text: - Applications which generate notifications, called 'notification originators.'
contents.zh-CHS: - 生成通知的应用程序，称为“通知发起人”

contents.text: - Applications which receive notifications, called 'notification receivers.'
contents.zh-CHS: - 接收通知的应用程序，称为“通知接收者”

contents.text: - Applications which forward SNMP Get, GetNext, GetBulk, and/or Set requests or notifications, called 'proxy forwarder.'
contents.zh-CHS: - 转发SNMP Get、GetNext、GetBulk和/或设置请求或通知的应用程序，称为“代理转发器”

contents.text: Note that there are no restrictions on which types of applications may be associated with a particular SNMP engine. For example, a single SNMP engine may, in fact, be associated with both command generator and command responder applications.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，对于与特定SNMP引擎关联的应用程序类型没有限制。例如，单个SNMP引擎实际上可能与命令生成器和命令响应程序应用程序都关联。

contents.text: 1.1. Command Generator Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 1.1. 命令生成器应用程序

contents.text: A command generator application initiates SNMP Get, GetNext, GetBulk, and/or Set requests, as well as processing the response to a request which it generated.
contents.zh-CHS: 命令生成器应用程序启动SNMP Get、GetNext、GetBulk和/或Set请求，并处理对其生成的请求的响应。

contents.text: 1.2. Command Responder Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2. 命令响应程序应用程序

contents.text: A command responder application receives SNMP Get, GetNext, GetBulk, and/or Set requests destined for the local system as indicated by the fact that the contextEngineID in the received request is equal to that of the local engine through which the request was received. The command responder application will perform the appropriate protocol operation, using access control, and will generate a response message to be sent to the request's originator.
contents.zh-CHS: 命令响应程序应用程序接收以本地系统为目的地的SNMP Get、GetNext、GetBulk和/或Set请求，这一事实表明，接收到的请求中的contextEngineID与接收请求的本地引擎的contextEngineID相等。命令响应程序应用程序将使用访问控制执行适当的协议操作，并将生成一条响应消息发送给请求的发起人。

contents.text: 1.3. Notification Originator Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3. 通知发起人申请

contents.text: A notification originator application conceptually monitors a system for particular events or conditions, and generates Trap and/or Inform messages based on these events or conditions. A notification originator must have a mechanism for determining where to send messages, and what SNMP version and security parameters to use when sending messages. A mechanism and MIB module for this purpose is provided in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 通知发起人应用程序在概念上监视系统的特定事件或条件，并基于这些事件或条件生成陷阱和/或通知消息。通知发起人必须具有一种机制，用于确定发送消息的位置，以及发送消息时要使用的SNMP版本和安全参数。本文档中提供了用于此目的的机制和MIB模块。

contents.text: 1.4. Notification Receiver Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4. 通知接收器应用程序

contents.text: A notification receiver application listens for notification messages, and generates response messages when a message containing an Inform PDU is received.
contents.zh-CHS: 通知接收器应用程序侦听通知消息，并在接收到包含Inform PDU的消息时生成响应消息。

contents.text: 1.5. Proxy Forwarder Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5. 代理转发器应用程序

contents.text: A proxy forwarder application forwards SNMP messages. Note that implementation of a proxy forwarder application is optional. The sections describing proxy (4.5, 5.3, and 8) may be skipped for
contents.zh-CHS: 代理转发器应用程序转发SNMP消息。请注意，代理转发器应用程序的实现是可选的。描述代理的章节（4.5、5.3和8）可能会被跳过

contents.text: implementations that do not include a proxy forwarder application.
contents.zh-CHS: 不包括代理转发器应用程序的实现。

contents.text: The term "proxy" has historically been used very loosely, with multiple different meanings. These different meanings include (among others):
contents.zh-CHS: “代理”一词在历史上使用得非常松散，有多种不同的含义。这些不同含义包括（除其他外）：

contents.text: (1) the forwarding of SNMP requests to other SNMP entities without regard for what managed object types are being accessed; for example, in order to forward an SNMP request from one transport domain to another, or to translate SNMP requests of one version into SNMP requests of another version;
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 将SNMP请求转发给其他SNMP实体，而不考虑正在访问的托管对象类型；例如，为了将SNMP请求从一个传输域转发到另一个传输域，或者将一个版本的SNMP请求转换为另一个版本的SNMP请求；

contents.text: (2) the translation of SNMP requests into operations of some non-SNMP management protocol; and
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 将SNMP请求转换为某些非SNMP管理协议的操作；和

contents.text: (3) support for aggregated managed objects where the value of one managed object instance depends upon the values of multiple other (remote) items of management information.
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 支持聚合托管对象，其中一个托管对象实例的值取决于多个其他（远程）管理信息项的值。

contents.text: Each of these scenarios can be advantageous; for example, support for aggregation of management information can significantly reduce the bandwidth requirements of large-scale management activities. However, using a single term to cover multiple different scenarios causes confusion.
contents.zh-CHS: 每种情况都是有利的；例如，对管理信息聚合的支持可以显著降低大规模管理活动的带宽需求。然而，使用一个术语来涵盖多个不同的场景会导致混淆。

contents.text: To avoid such confusion, this document uses the term "proxy" with a much more tightly defined meaning. The term "proxy" is used in this document to refer to a proxy forwarder application which forwards either SNMP requests, notifications, and responses without regard for what managed objects are contained within requests or notifications. This definition is most closely related to the first definition above. Note, however, that in the SNMP architecture [RFC2271], a proxy forwarder is actually an application, and need not be associated with what is traditionally thought of as an SNMP agent.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免这种混淆，本文件使用了“代理”一词，其定义更为严格。本文档中的术语“代理”是指代理转发器应用程序，它转发SNMP请求、通知和响应，而不考虑请求或通知中包含哪些托管对象。这一定义与上述第一个定义关系最为密切。但是，请注意，在SNMP体系结构[RFC2271]中，代理转发器实际上是一个应用程序，不需要与传统上认为的SNMP代理相关联。

contents.text: Specifically, the distinction between a traditional SNMP agent and a proxy forwarder application is simple:
contents.zh-CHS: 具体而言，传统SNMP代理和代理转发器应用程序之间的区别很简单：

contents.text: - a proxy forwarder application forwards requests and/or notifications to other SNMP engines according to the context, and irrespective of the specific managed object types being accessed, and forwards the response to such previously forwarded messages back to the SNMP engine from which the original message was received;
contents.zh-CHS: - 代理转发器应用程序根据上下文将请求和/或通知转发给其他SNMP引擎，而与正在访问的特定托管对象类型无关，并将对此类先前转发的消息的响应转发回接收原始消息的SNMP引擎；

contents.text: - in contrast, the command responder application that is part of what is traditionally thought of as an SNMP agent, and which processes SNMP requests according to the (names of the)
contents.zh-CHS: - 相反，命令响应程序应用程序是传统上被认为是SNMP代理的一部分，它根据（的名称）处理SNMP请求

contents.text: individual managed object types and instances being accessed, is NOT a proxy forwarder application from the perspective of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 从本文档的角度来看，正在访问的单个托管对象类型和实例不是代理转发器应用程序。

contents.text: Thus, when a proxy forwarder application forwards a request or notification for a particular contextEngineID / contextName pair, not only is the information on how to forward the request specifically associated with that context, but the proxy forwarder application has no need of a detailed definition of a MIB view (since the proxy forwarder application forwards the request irrespective of the managed object types).
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，当代理转发器应用程序转发特定contextEngineID/contextName对的请求或通知时，不仅有关如何转发与该上下文具体关联的请求的信息，而且代理转发器应用程序不需要MIB视图的详细定义（因为代理转发器应用程序转发请求，而与托管对象类型无关）。

contents.text: In contrast, a command responder application must have the detailed definition of the MIB view, and even if it needs to issue requests to other entities, via SNMP or otherwise, that need is dependent on the individual managed object instances being accessed (i.e., not only on the context).
contents.zh-CHS: 相反，命令响应程序应用程序必须具有MIB视图的详细定义，即使它需要通过SNMP或其他方式向其他实体发出请求，该需要取决于正在访问的单个托管对象实例（即，不仅取决于上下文）。

contents.text: Note that it is a design goal of a proxy forwarder application to act as an intermediary between the endpoints of a transaction. In particular, when forwarding Inform requests, the associated response is forwarded when it is received from the target to which the Inform request was forwarded, rather than generating a response immediately when an Inform request is received.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，代理转发器应用程序的设计目标是充当事务端点之间的中介。特别是，在转发通知请求时，当从转发通知请求的目标接收到相关响应时，将转发相关响应，而不是在接收到通知请求时立即生成响应。

contents.text: 2. Management Targets
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 管理目标

contents.text: Some types of applications (notification generators and proxy forwarders in particular) require a mechanism for determining where and how to send generated messages. This document provides a mechanism and MIB module for this purpose. The set of information that describes where and how to send a message is called a 'Management Target', and consists of two kinds of information:
contents.zh-CHS: 某些类型的应用程序（特别是通知生成器和代理转发器）需要一种机制来确定在何处以及如何发送生成的消息。本文档提供了用于此目的的机制和MIB模块。描述在何处以及如何发送消息的信息集称为“管理目标”，由两类信息组成：

contents.text: - Destination information, consisting of a transport domain and a transport address. This is also termed a transport endpoint.
contents.zh-CHS: - 目的地信息，由传输域和传输地址组成。这也称为传输端点。

contents.text: - SNMP parameters, consisting of message processing model, security model, security level, and security name information.
contents.zh-CHS: - SNMP参数，包括消息处理模型、安全模型、安全级别和安全名称信息。

contents.text: The SNMP-TARGET-MIB module described later in this document contains one table for each of these types of information. There can be a many-to-many relationship in the MIB between these two types of information. That is, there may be multiple transport endpoints associated with a particular set of SNMP parameters, or a particular transport endpoint may be associated with several sets of SNMP parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档后面介绍的SNMP-TARGET-MIB模块包含每种类型信息的一个表。在MIB中，这两种类型的信息之间可能存在多对多关系。也就是说，可能有多个传输端点与一组特定的SNMP参数相关联，或者一个特定的传输端点可能与多组SNMP参数相关联。

contents.text: 3. Elements Of Procedure
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 程序要素

contents.text: The following sections describe the procedures followed by each type of application when generating messages for transmission or when processing received messages. Applications communicate with the Dispatcher using the abstract service interfaces defined in [RFC2271].
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节描述了每种类型的应用程序在生成用于传输的消息或处理接收到的消息时所遵循的过程。应用程序使用[RFC2271]中定义的抽象服务接口与调度器通信。

contents.text: 3.1. Command Generator Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. 命令生成器应用程序

contents.text: A command generator initiates an SNMP request by calling the Dispatcher using the following abstract service interface:
contents.zh-CHS: 命令生成器通过使用以下抽象服务接口调用调度程序来启动SNMP请求：

contents.text:
statusInformation =              -- sendPduHandle if success
                                 -- errorIndication if failure
  sendPdu(
  IN   transportDomain           -- transport domain to be used
  IN   transportAddress          -- destination network address
  IN   messageProcessingModel    -- typically, SNMP version
  IN   securityModel             -- Security Model to use
  IN   securityName              -- on behalf of this principal
  IN   securityLevel             -- Level of Security requested
  IN   contextEngineID           -- data from/at this entity
  IN   contextName               -- data from/in this context
  IN   pduVersion                -- the version of the PDU
  IN   PDU                       -- SNMP Protocol Data Unit
  IN   expectResponse            -- TRUE or FALSE
       )
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The transportDomain is that of the destination of the message.
contents.zh-CHS: - transportDomain是消息的目标域。

contents.text: - The transportAddress is that of the destination of the message.
contents.zh-CHS: - transportAddress是消息目的地的地址。

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel indicates which Message Processing Model the application wishes to use.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel指示应用程序希望使用的消息处理模型。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the security model that the application wishes to use.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是应用程序希望使用的安全模型。

contents.text: - The securityName is the security model independent name for the principal on whose behalf the application wishes the message is to be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是应用程序希望代表其生成消息的主体的独立于安全模型的名称。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the security level that the application wishes to use.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是应用程序希望使用的安全级别。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is provided by the command generator if it wishes to explicitly specify the location of the management information it is requesting.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果命令生成器希望显式指定其请求的管理信息的位置，则contextEngineID由命令生成器提供。

contents.text: - The contextName is provided by the command generator if it wishes to explicitly specify the local context name for the management information it is requesting.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果命令生成器希望为其请求的管理信息显式指定本地上下文名称，则contextName由命令生成器提供。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU to be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示要发送的PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is a value constructed by the command generator containing the management operation that the command generator wishes to perform.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是由命令生成器构造的值，包含命令生成器希望执行的管理操作。

contents.text: - The expectResponse argument indicates that a response is expected.
contents.zh-CHS: - expectResponse参数表示需要响应。

contents.text: The result of the sendPdu interface indicates whether the PDU was successfully sent. If it was successfully sent, the returned value will be a sendPduHandle. The command generator should store the sendPduHandle so that it can correlate a response to the original request.
contents.zh-CHS: sendPdu接口的结果指示PDU是否已成功发送。如果成功发送，返回的值将是sendPduHandle。命令生成器应该存储sendPduHandle，以便将响应与原始请求关联起来。

contents.text: The Dispatcher is responsible for delivering the response to a particular request to the correct command generator application. The abstract service interface used is:
contents.zh-CHS: 调度器负责将对特定请求的响应传递给正确的命令生成器应用程序。使用的抽象服务接口是：

contents.text:
processResponsePdu(              -- process Response PDU
  IN   messageProcessingModel    -- typically, SNMP version
  IN   securityModel             -- Security Model in use
  IN   securityName              -- on behalf of this principal
  IN   securityLevel             -- Level of Security
  IN   contextEngineID           -- data from/at this SNMP entity
  IN   contextName               -- data from/in this context
  IN   pduVersion                -- the version of the PDU
  IN   PDU                       -- SNMP Protocol Data Unit
  IN   statusInformation         -- success or errorIndication
  IN   sendPduHandle             -- handle from sendPDU
       )
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是接收到的响应的值。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是接收到的响应的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是接收到的响应中的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是接收到的响应的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是接收到的响应中的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是接收到的响应中的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU in the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示接收到的响应中PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the value from the received response.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是接收到的响应的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates success or failure in receiving the response.
contents.zh-CHS: - 状态信息表示接收响应的成功或失败。

contents.text: - The sendPduHandle is the value returned by the sendPdu call which generated the original request to which this is a response.
contents.zh-CHS: - sendPduHandle是sendPdu调用返回的值，该调用生成了原始请求，这是对原始请求的响应。

contents.text: The procedure when a command generator receives a message is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 命令生成器收到消息时的过程如下：

contents.text: (1) If the received values of messageProcessingModel, securityModel, securityName, contextEngineID, contextName, and pduVersion are not all equal to the values used in the original request, the response is discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 如果收到的messageProcessingModel、securityModel、securityName、contextEngineID、contextName和pduVersion的值与原始请求中使用的值不一致，则丢弃响应。

contents.text: (2) The operation type, request-id, error-status, error-index, and variable-bindings are extracted from the PDU and saved. If the request-id is not equal to the value used in the original request, the response is discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 从PDU中提取并保存操作类型、请求id、错误状态、错误索引和变量绑定。如果请求id不等于原始请求中使用的值，则丢弃响应。

contents.text: (3) At this point, it is up to the application to take an appropriate action. The specific action is implementation dependent. If the statusInformation indicates that the request failed, an appropriate action might be to attempt to transmit the request again, or to notify the person operating the application that a failure occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 此时，应由应用程序采取适当的操作。具体操作取决于实现。如果statusInformation指示请求失败，则适当的操作可能是再次尝试传输请求，或通知操作应用程序的人员发生故障。

contents.text: 3.2. Command Responder Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 命令响应程序应用程序

contents.text: Before a command responder application can process messages, it must first associate itself with an SNMP engine. The abstract service interface used for this purpose is:
contents.zh-CHS: 命令响应程序应用程序必须先将自身与SNMP引擎关联，然后才能处理消息。用于此目的的抽象服务接口是：

contents.text:
statusInformation =        -- success or errorIndication
  registerContextEngineID(
  IN   contextEngineID     -- take responsibility for this one
  IN   pduType             -- the pduType(s) to be registered
       )
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates success or failure of the registration attempt.
contents.zh-CHS: - 状态信息表示注册尝试成功或失败。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is equal to the snmpEngineID of the SNMP engine with which the command responder is registering.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID等于命令响应程序正在注册的SNMP引擎的snmpEngineID。

contents.text: - The pduType indicates a Get, GetNext, GetBulk, or Set pdu.
contents.zh-CHS: - pduType表示Get、GetNext、GetBulk或Set pdu。

contents.text: Note that if another command responder application is already registered with an SNMP engine, any further attempts to register with the same contextEngineID and pduType will be denied. This implies that separate command responder applications could register separately for the various pdu types. However, in practice this is undesirable, and only a single command responder application should be registered with an SNMP engine at any given time.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，如果另一个命令响应程序应用程序已在SNMP引擎中注册，则任何进一步尝试使用相同的contextEngineID和pduType注册的操作都将被拒绝。这意味着单独的命令响应程序应用程序可以为各种pdu类型单独注册。然而，在实践中，这是不可取的，在任何给定的时间，只有一个命令响应程序应用程序应该向SNMP引擎注册。

contents.text: A command responder application can disassociate with an SNMP engine using the following abstract service interface:
contents.zh-CHS: 命令响应程序应用程序可以使用以下抽象服务接口与SNMP引擎解除关联：

contents.text:
unregisterContextEngineID(
  IN   contextEngineID     -- give up responsibility for this one
  IN   pduType             -- the pduType(s) to be unregistered
       )
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is equal to the snmpEngineID of the SNMP engine with which the command responder is cancelling the registration.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID等于命令响应程序取消注册的SNMP引擎的snmpEngineID。

contents.text: - The pduType indicates a Get, GetNext, GetBulk, or Set pdu.
contents.zh-CHS: - pduType表示Get、GetNext、GetBulk或Set pdu。

contents.text: Once the command responder has registered with the SNMP engine, it waits to receive SNMP messages. The abstract service interface used for receiving messages is:
contents.zh-CHS: 命令响应程序在SNMP引擎中注册后，将等待接收SNMP消息。用于接收消息的抽象服务接口是：

contents.text:
processPdu(                     -- process Request/Notification PDU
  IN   messageProcessingModel   -- typically, SNMP version
  IN   securityModel            -- Security Model in use
  IN   securityName             -- on behalf of this principal

IN   securityLevel            -- Level of Security
IN   contextEngineID          -- data from/at this SNMP entity
IN   contextName              -- data from/in this context
IN   pduVersion               -- the version of the PDU
IN   PDU                      -- SNMP Protocol Data Unit
IN   maxSizeResponseScopedPDU -- maximum size of the Response PDU
IN   stateReference           -- reference to state information
     )                        -- needed when sending a response
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel indicates which Message Processing Model received and processed the message.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel指示哪个消息处理模型接收和处理了该消息。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU in the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示接收到的消息中PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is the maximum allowable size of a ScopedPDU containing a Response PDU (based on the maximum message size that the originator of the message can accept).
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是包含响应PDU的ScopedPDU允许的最大大小（基于消息的原始发件人可以接受的最大消息大小）。

contents.text: - The stateReference is a value which references cached information about each received request message. This value must be returned to the Dispatcher in order to generate a response.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是一个值，它引用有关每个接收到的请求消息的缓存信息。为了生成响应，必须将该值返回给调度程序。

contents.text: The procedure when a message is received is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收到消息时的过程如下所示。

contents.text: (1) The operation type is determined from the ASN.1 tag value associated with the PDU parameter. The operation type should always be one of the types previously registered by the application.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 操作类型由与PDU参数关联的ASN.1标记值确定。操作类型应始终是应用程序先前注册的类型之一。

contents.text: (2) The request-id is extracted from the PDU and saved.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 请求id从PDU中提取并保存。

contents.text: (3) If the SNMPv2 operation type is GetBulk, the non-repeaters and max-repetitions values are extracted from the PDU and saved.
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 如果SNMPv2操作类型为GetBulk，则从PDU中提取并保存非中继器和最大重复次数值。

contents.text: (4) The variable-bindings are extracted from the PDU and saved.
contents.zh-CHS: (4) 变量绑定从PDU中提取并保存。

contents.text: (5) The management operation represented by the SNMPv2 operation type is performed with respect to the relevant MIB view within the context named by the contextName, according to the procedures set forth in [RFC1905]. The relevant MIB view is determined by the securityLevel, securityModel, contextName, securityName, and SNMPv2 operation type. To determine whether a particular object instance is within the relevant MIB view, the following abstract service interface is called:
contents.zh-CHS: (5) 根据[RFC1905]中规定的程序，针对contextName命名的上下文中的相关MIB视图执行由SNMPv2操作类型表示的管理操作。相关MIB视图由securityLevel、securityModel、contextName、securityName和SNMPv2操作类型确定。要确定特定对象实例是否在相关MIB视图中，将调用以下抽象服务接口：

contents.text:
statusInformation =      -- success or errorIndication
  isAccessAllowed(
  IN   securityModel     -- Security Model in use
  IN   securityName      -- principal who wants to access
  IN   securityLevel     -- Level of Security
  IN   viewType          -- read, write, or notify view
  IN   contextName       -- context containing variableName
  IN   variableName      -- OID for the managed object
       )
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The viewType indicates whether the PDU type is a read or write operation.
contents.zh-CHS: - viewType指示PDU类型是读操作还是写操作。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The variableName is the object instance of the variable for which access rights are to be checked.
contents.zh-CHS: - variableName是要检查其访问权限的变量的对象实例。

contents.text: Normally, the result of the management operation will be a new PDU value, and processing will continue in step (6) below. However, at any time during the processing of the management operation:
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，管理操作的结果将是一个新的PDU值，处理将在下面的步骤（6）中继续。但是，在管理操作过程中的任何时候：

contents.text: - If the isAccessAllowed ASI returns a noSuchView, noAccessEntry, or noGroupName error, processing of the management operation is halted, a PDU value is contructed using the values from the originally received PDU, but
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果isAccessAllowed ASI返回noSuchView、noAccessEntry或noGroupName错误，则停止管理操作的处理，使用最初接收到的PDU的值构造PDU值，但

contents.text: replacing the error_status with an authorizationError code, and error_index value of 0, and control is passed to step (6) below.
contents.zh-CHS: 用authorizationError代码替换error_状态，error_索引值为0，控制权传递到下面的步骤（6）。

contents.text: - If the isAccessAllowed ASI returns an otherError, processing of the management operation is halted, a different PDU value is contructed using the values from the originally received PDU, but replacing the error_status with a genError code, and control is passed to step (6) below.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果isAccessAllowed ASI返回otherError，则管理操作的处理将停止，使用来自原始接收PDU的值构造不同的PDU值，但将错误状态替换为GenerError代码，并将控制传递到下面的步骤（6）。

contents.text: - If the isAccessAllowed ASI returns a noSuchContext error, processing of the management operation is halted, no result PDU is generated, the snmpUnknownContexts counter is incremented, and control is passed to step (6) below.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果isAccessAllowed ASI返回noSuchContext错误，则停止管理操作的处理，不生成结果PDU，snmpUnknownContexts计数器递增，控制权传递到下面的步骤（6）。

contents.text: - If the context named by the contextName parameter is unavailable, processing of the management operation is halted, no result PDU is generated, the snmpUnavailableContexts counter is incremented, and control is passed to step (6) below.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果由contextName参数命名的上下文不可用，则管理操作的处理将停止，不生成结果PDU，snmpUnavailableContexts计数器将递增，控制权将传递到下面的步骤（6）。

contents.text: (6) The Dispatcher is called to generate a response or report message. The abstract service interface is:
contents.zh-CHS: (6) 调用调度程序以生成响应或报告消息。抽象服务接口是：

contents.text:
returnResponsePdu(
  IN   messageProcessingModel   -- typically, SNMP version
  IN   securityModel            -- Security Model in use
  IN   securityName             -- on behalf of this principal
  IN   securityLevel            -- same as on incoming request
  IN   contextEngineID          -- data from/at this SNMP entity
  IN   contextName              -- data from/in this context
  IN   pduVersion               -- the version of the PDU
  IN   PDU                      -- SNMP Protocol Data Unit
  IN   maxSizeResponseScopedPDU -- maximum size of the Response PDU
  IN   stateReference           -- reference to state information
                                -- as presented with the request
  IN   statusInformation        -- success or errorIndication
       )                        -- error counter OID/value if error
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU to be returned. If no result PDU was generated, the pduVersion is an undefined value.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示要返回的PDU版本。如果未生成结果PDU，则PDU版本为未定义的值。

contents.text: - The PDU is the result generated in step (5) above. If no result PDU was generated, the PDU is an undefined value.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是在上述步骤（5）中生成的结果。如果未生成结果PDU，则PDU是未定义的值。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation either contains an indication that no error occurred and that a response should be generated, or contains an indication that an error occurred along with the OID and counter value of the appropriate error counter object.
contents.zh-CHS: - statusInformation包含未发生错误和应生成响应的指示，或者包含发生错误的指示以及相应错误计数器对象的OID和计数器值。

contents.text: Note that a command responder application should always call the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface, even in the event of an error such as a resource allocation error. In the event of such an error, the PDU value passed to returnResponsePdu should contain appropriate values for errorStatus and errorIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，命令响应程序应用程序应始终调用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口，即使在发生错误（如资源分配错误）时也是如此。发生此类错误时，传递给returnResponsePdu的PDU值应包含errorStatus和errorIndex的适当值。

contents.text: 3.3. Notification Originator Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 通知发起人申请

contents.text: A notification originator application generates SNMP notification messages. A notification message may, for example, contain an SNMPv2-Trap PDU or an Inform PDU. However, a particular implementation is not required to be capable of generating both types of messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 通知发起人应用程序生成SNMP通知消息。例如，通知消息可以包含SNMPv2陷阱PDU或通知PDU。但是，不要求特定的实现能够生成这两种类型的消息。

contents.text: Notification originator applications require a mechanism for identifying the management targets to which notifications should be sent. The particular mechanism used is implementation dependent. However, if an implementation makes the configuration of management targets SNMP manageable, it MUST use the SNMP-TARGET-MIB module described in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 通知发起人应用程序需要一种机制来识别应向其发送通知的管理目标。所使用的特定机制取决于实现。但是，如果实现使管理目标SNMP的配置可管理，则必须使用本文档中描述的SNMP-TARGET-MIB模块。

contents.text: When a notification originator wishes to generate a notification, it must first determine in which context the information to be conveyed in the notification exists, i.e., it must determine the contextEngineID and contextName. It must then determine the set of
contents.zh-CHS: 当通知发起人希望生成通知时，必须首先确定通知中要传达的信息存在于哪个上下文中，即必须确定contextEngineID和contextName。然后，它必须确定

contents.text: management targets to which the notification should be sent. The application must also determine, for each management target, whether the notification message should contain an SNMPv2-Trap PDU or Inform PDU, and if it is to contain an Inform PDU, the number of retries and retransmission algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 应向其发送通知的管理目标。对于每个管理目标，应用程序还必须确定通知消息是否应包含SNMPv2陷阱PDU或Inform PDU，以及如果要包含Inform PDU，重试次数和重传算法。

contents.text: The mechanism by which a notification originator determines this information is implementation dependent. Once the application has determined this information, the following procedure is performed for each management target:
contents.zh-CHS: 通知发起人确定此信息的机制取决于实现。应用程序确定此信息后，将对每个管理目标执行以下程序：

contents.text: (1) Any appropriate filtering mechanisms are applied to determine whether the notification should be sent to the management target. If such filtering mechanisms determine that the notification should not be sent, processing continues with the next management target. Otherwise,
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 应用任何适当的过滤机制来确定是否应将通知发送给管理目标。如果此类过滤机制确定不应发送通知，则处理将继续到下一个管理目标。否则

contents.text: (2) The appropriate set of variable-bindings is retrieved from local MIB instrumentation within the relevant MIB view. The relevant MIB view is determined by the securityLevel, securityModel, contextName, and securityName of the management target. To determine whether a particular object instance is within the relevant MIB view, the isAccessAllowed abstract service interface is used, in the same manner as described in the preceding section. If the statusInformation returned by isAccessAllowed does not indicate accessAllowed, the notification is not sent to the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 从相关MIB视图中的本地MIB检测中检索适当的变量绑定集。相关MIB视图由管理目标的securityLevel、securityModel、contextName和securityName确定。为了确定特定对象实例是否在相关MIB视图中，将使用isAccessAllowed抽象服务接口，方式与上一节中所述相同。如果isAccessAllowed返回的状态信息不表示accessAllowed，则不会向管理目标发送通知。

contents.text: (3) A PDU is constructed using a locally unique request-id value, an operation type of SNMPv2-Trap or Inform, an error-status and error-index value of 0, and the variable-bindings supplied previously in step (2).
contents.zh-CHS: (3) PDU使用本地唯一的请求id值、SNMPv2 Trap或Inform的操作类型、错误状态和错误索引值0以及前面在步骤（2）中提供的变量绑定来构造。

contents.text: (4) If the notification contains an SNMPv2-Trap PDU, the Dispatcher is called using the following abstract service interface:
contents.zh-CHS: (4) 如果通知包含SNMPv2陷阱PDU，则使用以下抽象服务接口调用调度程序：

contents.text:
statusInformation =              -- sendPduHandle if success
                                 -- errorIndication if failure
  sendPdu(
  IN   transportDomain           -- transport domain to be used
  IN   transportAddress          -- destination network address
  IN   messageProcessingModel    -- typically, SNMP version
  IN   securityModel             -- Security Model to use
  IN   securityName              -- on behalf of this principal
  IN   securityLevel             -- Level of Security requested
  IN   contextEngineID           -- data from/at this entity
  IN   contextName               -- data from/in this context
  IN   pduVersion                -- the version of the PDU
Where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - The transportDomain is that of the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - transportDomain是管理目标的域。

contents.text: - The transportAddress is that of the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - transportAddress是管理目标的地址。

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is that of the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是管理目标的模型。

contents.text: - The securityModel is that of the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - 安全模型是管理目标的安全模型。

contents.text: - The securityName is that of the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是管理目标的名称。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is that of the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - 安全级别是管理目标的安全级别。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value originally determined for the notification.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是最初为通知确定的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value originally determined for the notification.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是最初为通知确定的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion is the version of the PDU to be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本是要发送的PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the value constructed in step (3) above.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是在上述步骤（3）中构造的值。

contents.text: - The expectResponse argument indicates that no response is expected.
contents.zh-CHS: - expectResponse参数表示不需要响应。

contents.text: Otherwise,
contents.zh-CHS: 否则

contents.text: (5) If the notification contains an Inform PDU, then:
contents.zh-CHS: (5) 如果通知包含通知PDU，则：

contents.text: a) The Dispatcher is called using the sendPdu abstract service interface as described in step (4) above, except that the expectResponse argument indicates that a response is expected.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 使用上述步骤（4）中所述的sendPdu抽象服务接口调用Dispatcher，但expectResponse参数表示需要响应。

contents.text: b) The application caches information about the management target.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 应用程序缓存有关管理目标的信息。

contents.text: c) If a response is received within an appropriate time interval from the transport endpoint of the management target, the notification is considered acknowledged and the cached information is deleted. Otherwise,
contents.zh-CHS: c) 如果在适当的时间间隔内从管理目标的传输端点接收到响应，则该通知将被视为已确认，并且缓存的信息将被删除。否则

contents.text: d) If a response is not received within an appropriate time period, or if a report indication is received, information about the management target is retrieved from the cache, and steps a) through d) are repeated. The number of times these steps are repeated is equal to the previously determined retry count. If this retry count is exceeded, the acknowledgement of the notification is considered to have failed, and processing of the notification for this management target is halted.
contents.zh-CHS: d) 如果在适当的时间段内未接收到响应，或者如果接收到报告指示，则从缓存检索关于管理目标的信息，并且重复步骤a）到d）。重复这些步骤的次数等于先前确定的重试次数。如果超过此重试次数，则认为通知确认失败，并停止处理此管理目标的通知。

contents.text: Responses to Inform PDU notifications will be received via the processResponsePDU abstract service interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 通知PDU通知的响应将通过processResponsePDU抽象服务接口接收。

contents.text: 3.4. Notification Receiver Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. 通知接收器应用程序

contents.text: Notification receiver applications receive SNMP Notification messages from the Dispatcher. Before any messages can be received, the notification receiver must register with the Dispatcher using the registerContextEngineID abstract service interface. The parameters used are:
contents.zh-CHS: 通知接收器应用程序从调度程序接收SNMP通知消息。在接收任何消息之前，通知接收方必须使用registerContextEngineID抽象服务接口向调度器注册。使用的参数包括：

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is an undefined 'wildcard' value. Notifications are delivered to a registered notification receiver regardless of the contextEngineID contained in the notification message.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是未定义的“通配符”值。无论通知消息中包含的contextEngineID是什么，通知都会传递给已注册的通知接收方。

contents.text: - The pduType indicates the type of notifications that the application wishes to receive (for example, SNMPv2-Trap PDUs or Inform PDUs).
contents.zh-CHS: - pduType指示应用程序希望接收的通知类型（例如，SNMPv2陷阱PDU或通知PDU）。

contents.text: Once the notification receiver has registered with the Dispatcher, messages are received using the processPdu abstract service interface. Parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: 通知接收者向调度器注册后，将使用processPdu抽象服务接口接收消息。参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel indicates which Message Processing Model received and processed the message.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel指示哪个消息处理模型接收和处理了该消息。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是接收到的消息中的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU in the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示接收到的消息中PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the value from the received message.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是接收到的消息的值。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is the maximum allowable size of a ScopedPDU containing a Response PDU (based on the maximum message size that the originator of the message can accept).
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是包含响应PDU的ScopedPDU允许的最大大小（基于消息的原始发件人可以接受的最大消息大小）。

contents.text: - If the message contains an SNMPv2-Trap PDU, the stateReference is undefined and unused. Otherwise, the stateReference is a value which references cached information about the notification. This value must be returned to the Dispatcher in order to generate a response.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果消息包含SNMPv2陷阱PDU，则stateReference未定义且未使用。否则，stateReference是一个引用有关通知的缓存信息的值。为了生成响应，必须将该值返回给调度程序。

contents.text: When an SNMPv2-Trap PDU is delivered to a notification receiver application, it first extracts the SNMP operation type, request-id, error-status, error-index, and variable-bindings from the PDU. After this, processing depends on the particular implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: 当SNMPv2陷阱PDU交付给通知接收器应用程序时，它首先从PDU提取SNMP操作类型、请求id、错误状态、错误索引和变量绑定。在此之后，处理取决于特定的实现。

contents.text: When an Inform PDU is received, the notification receiver application follows the following procedure:
contents.zh-CHS: 当接收到通知PDU时，通知接收器应用程序遵循以下过程：

contents.text: (1) The SNMPv2 operation type, request-id, error-status, error-index, and variable-bindings are extracted from the PDU.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) SNMPv2操作类型、请求id、错误状态、错误索引和变量绑定从PDU中提取。

contents.text: (2) A Response PDU is constructed using the extracted request-id and variable-bindings, and with error-status and error-index both set to 0.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 响应PDU是使用提取的请求id和变量绑定构造的，并且错误状态和错误索引都设置为0。

contents.text: (3) The Dispatcher is called to generate a response message using the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface. Parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 调用Dispatcher以使用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口生成响应消息。参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU to be returned.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示要返回的PDU版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the result generated in step (2) above.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是在上述步骤（2）中生成的结果。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates that no error occurred and that a response should be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: - statusInformation指示未发生错误，应生成响应。

contents.text: 3.5. Proxy Forwarder Applications
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5. 代理转发器应用程序

contents.text: A proxy forwarder application deals with forwarding SNMP messages. There are four basic types of messages which a proxy forwarder application may need to forward. These are grouped according to the PDU type contained in a message, or according to whether a report indication is contained in the message. The four basic types of messages are:
contents.zh-CHS: 代理转发器应用程序处理转发SNMP消息。代理转发器应用程序可能需要转发四种基本类型的消息。它们根据消息中包含的PDU类型或消息中是否包含报告指示进行分组。消息的四种基本类型是：

contents.text: - Those containing PDU types which were generated by a command generator application (for example, Get, GetNext, GetBulk, and Set PDU types). These deal with requesting or modifying information located within a particular context.
contents.zh-CHS: - 包含由命令生成器应用程序生成的PDU类型（例如Get、GetNext、GetBulk和Set PDU类型）。这些处理请求或修改位于特定上下文中的信息。

contents.text: - Those containing PDU types which were generated by a notification originator application (for example, SNMPv2-Trap and Inform PDU types). These deal with notifications concerning information located within a particular context.
contents.zh-CHS: - 那些包含由通知发起人应用程序生成的PDU类型（例如，SNMPv2陷阱和通知PDU类型）。它们处理与位于特定上下文中的信息有关的通知。

contents.text: - Those containing a Response PDU type. Forwarding of Response PDUs always occurs as a result of receiving a response to a previously forwarded message.
contents.zh-CHS: - 包含响应PDU类型的。响应PDU的转发总是由于接收到对先前转发的消息的响应而发生。

contents.text: - Those containing a report indication. Forwarding of report indications always occurs as a result of receiving a report indication for a previously forwarded message.
contents.zh-CHS: - 包含报告指示的。报告指示的转发总是在收到先前转发消息的报告指示后发生。

contents.text: For the first type, the proxy forwarder's role is to deliver a request for management information to an SNMP engine which is "closer" or "downstream in the path" to the SNMP engine which has access to that information, and to deliver the response containing the information back to the SNMP engine from which the request was received. The context information in a request is used to determine which SNMP engine has access to the requested information, and this is used to determine where and how to forward the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于第一种类型，代理转发器的角色是将管理信息的请求传递给SNMP引擎，该引擎与能够访问该信息的SNMP引擎“更近”或“路径下游”，并将包含该信息的响应传递回接收该请求的SNMP引擎。请求中的上下文信息用于确定哪个SNMP引擎可以访问请求的信息，这用于确定在何处以及如何转发请求。

contents.text: For the second type, the proxy forwarder's role is to determine which SNMP engines should receive notifications about management information from a particular location. The context information in a notification message determines the location to which the information contained in the notification applies. This is used to determine which SNMP engines should receive notification about this information.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于第二种类型，代理转发器的角色是确定哪些SNMP引擎应该从特定位置接收有关管理信息的通知。通知消息中的上下文信息确定通知中包含的信息应用到的位置。这用于确定哪些SNMP引擎应接收有关此信息的通知。

contents.text: For the third type, the proxy forwarder's role is to determine which previously forwarded request or notification (if any) the response matches, and to forward the response back to the initiator of the request or notification.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于第三种类型，代理转发器的角色是确定响应与之前转发的请求或通知（如果有）匹配，并将响应转发回请求或通知的发起人。

contents.text: For the fourth type, the proxy forwarder's role is to determine which previously forwarded request or notification (if any) the report indication matches, and to forward the report indication back to the initiator of the request or notification.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于第四种类型，代理转发器的角色是确定报告指示与先前转发的请求或通知（如果有）匹配，并将报告指示转发回请求或通知的发起人。

contents.text: When forwarding messages, a proxy forwarder application must perform a translation of incoming management target information into outgoing management target information. How this translation is performed is implementation specific. In many cases, this will be driven by a preconfigured translation table. If a proxy forwarder application makes the contents of this table SNMP manageable, it MUST use the SNMP-PROXY-MIB module defined in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 转发邮件时，代理转发器应用程序必须将传入的管理目标信息转换为传出的管理目标信息。如何执行此转换是特定于实现的。在许多情况下，这将由预配置的翻译表驱动。如果代理转发器应用程序使此表的内容易于管理，则必须使用本文档中定义的SNMP-proxy-MIB模块。

contents.text: 3.5.1. Request Forwarding
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.1. 请求转发

contents.text: There are two phases for request forwarding. First, the incoming request needs to be passed through the proxy application. Then, the resulting response needs to be passed back. These phases are described in the following two sections.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求转发分为两个阶段。首先，传入的请求需要通过代理应用程序传递。然后，需要将结果响应传回。以下两节将介绍这些阶段。

contents.text: 3.5.1.1. Processing an Incoming Request
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.1.1. 处理传入请求

contents.text: A proxy forwarder application that wishes to forward request messages must first register with the Dispatcher using the registerContextEngineID abstract service interface. The proxy forwarder must register each contextEngineID for which it wishes to forward messages, as well as for each pduType. Note that as the configuration of a proxy forwarder is changed, the particular contextEngineID values for which it is forwarding may change. The proxy forwarder should call the registerContextEngineID and unregisterContextEngineID abstract service interfaces as needed to reflect its current configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 希望转发请求消息的代理转发器应用程序必须首先使用registerContextEngineID抽象服务接口向调度器注册。代理转发器必须注册它希望转发消息的每个contextEngineID以及每个pduType。请注意，随着代理转发器配置的更改，其正在转发的特定contextEngineID值可能会更改。代理转发器应根据需要调用registerContextEngineID和unregisterContextEngineID抽象服务接口，以反映其当前配置。

contents.text: A proxy forwarder application should never attempt to register a value of contextEngineID which is equal to the snmpEngineID of the SNMP engine to which the proxy forwarder is associated.
contents.zh-CHS: 代理转发器应用程序不应尝试注册contextEngineID的值，该值等于代理转发器关联的SNMP引擎的snmpEngineID。

contents.text: Once the proxy forwarder has registered for the appropriate contextEngineId values, it can start processing messages. The following procedure is used:
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦代理转发器注册了相应的contextEngineId值，它就可以开始处理消息。使用以下程序：

contents.text: (1) A message is received using the processPdu abstract service interface. The incoming management target information received from the processPdu interface is translated into outgoing management target information. Note that this translation may vary for different values of contextEngineID and/or contextName. The translation should result in a single management target.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 使用processPdu抽象服务接口接收消息。从processPdu接口接收的传入管理目标信息被转换为传出管理目标信息。请注意，此转换可能因contextEngineID和/或contextName的不同值而不同。翻译应形成单一的管理目标。

contents.text: (2) If appropriate outgoing management target information cannot be found, the proxy forwarder increments the snmpProxyDrops counter [RFC1907], and then calls the Dispatcher using the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface. Parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 如果找不到适当的传出管理目标信息，代理转发器将递增snmpProxyDrops计数器[RFC1907]，然后使用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口调用调度程序。参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - pduVersion是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The PDU is an undefined value.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是一个未定义的值。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the value from the processPdu call.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是来自processPdu调用的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates that an error occurred and includes the OID and value of the snmpProxyDrops object.
contents.zh-CHS: - statusInformation表示发生了错误，包括snmpProxyDrops对象的OID和值。

contents.text: Processing of the message stops at this point. Otherwise,
contents.zh-CHS: 消息的处理在此点停止。否则

contents.text: (3) A new PDU is constructed. A unique value of request-id should be used in the new PDU (this value will enable a subsequent response message to be correlated with this request). The remainder of the new PDU is identical to the received PDU, unless the incoming SNMP version is SNMPv2 or SNMPv3 and the outgoing SNMP version is SNMPv1, in which case the proxy forwarder must apply the translation rules as documented in [RFC1908].
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 构造了一个新的PDU。新PDU中应使用请求id的唯一值（该值将使后续响应消息与该请求关联）。新PDU的其余部分与接收到的PDU相同，除非传入的SNMP版本为SNMPv2或SNMPv3，传出的SNMP版本为SNMPv1，在这种情况下，代理转发器必须应用[RFC1908]中记录的转换规则。

contents.text: (4) The proxy forwarder calls the Dispatcher to generate the forwarded message, using the sendPdu abstract service interface. The parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: (4) 代理转发器使用sendPdu抽象服务接口调用调度程序生成转发的消息。参数包括：

contents.text: - The transportDomain is that of the outgoing management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - transportDomain是传出管理目标的域。

contents.text: - The transportAddress is that of the outgoing management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - transportAddress是传出管理目标的地址。

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is that of the outgoing management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是传出管理目标的messageProcessingModel。

contents.text: - The securityModel is that of the outgoing management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是传出管理目标的模型。

contents.text: - The securityName is that of the outgoing management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是传出管理目标的名称。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is that of the outgoing management target.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是传出管理目标的级别。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value originally received.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value originally received.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion is the version of the PDU to be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本是要发送的PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the value constructed in step (3) above.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是在上述步骤（3）中构造的值。

contents.text: - The expectResponse argument indicates that a response is expected. If the sendPdu call is unsuccessful, the proxy forwarder performs the steps described in (2) above. Otherwise:
contents.zh-CHS: - expectResponse参数表示需要响应。如果sendPdu调用不成功，代理转发器将执行上述（2）中所述的步骤。否则：

contents.text: (5) The proxy forwarder caches the following information in order to match an incoming response to the forwarded request:
contents.zh-CHS: (5) 代理转发器缓存以下信息，以便将传入响应与转发的请求相匹配：

contents.text: - The sendPduHandle returned from the call to sendPdu,
contents.zh-CHS: - sendPdu句柄从对sendPdu的调用返回，

contents.text: - The request-id from the received PDU.
contents.zh-CHS: - 来自接收到的PDU的请求id。

contents.text: - the contextEngineID,
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID，

contents.text: - the contextName,
contents.zh-CHS: - 上下文名称，

contents.text: - the stateReference,
contents.zh-CHS: - 州参考号，

contents.text: - the incoming management target information,
contents.zh-CHS: - 传入的管理目标信息，

contents.text: - the outgoing management information,
contents.zh-CHS: - 传出的管理信息，

contents.text: - any other information needed to match an incoming response to the forwarded request.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将传入响应与转发请求匹配所需的任何其他信息。

contents.text: If this information cannot be cached (possibly due to a lack of resources), the proxy forwarder performs the steps described in (2) above. Otherwise:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果无法缓存此信息（可能是由于缺乏资源），代理转发器将执行上述（2）中所述的步骤。否则：

contents.text: (6) Processing of the request stops until a response to the forwarded request is received, or until an appropriate time interval has expired. If this time interval expires before a response has been received, the cached information about this request is removed.
contents.zh-CHS: (6) 在收到对转发请求的响应或在适当的时间间隔到期之前，请求的处理将停止。如果此时间间隔在收到响应之前过期，则有关此请求的缓存信息将被删除。

contents.text: 3.5.1.2. Processing an Incoming Response
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.1.2. 处理传入响应

contents.text: A proxy forwarder follows the following procedure when an incoming response is received:
contents.zh-CHS: 收到传入响应时，代理转发器遵循以下过程：

contents.text: (1) The incoming response is received using the processResponsePdu interface. The proxy forwarder uses the received parameters to locate an entry in its cache of pending forwarded requests. This is done by matching the received parameters with the cached values of sendPduHandle, contextEngineID, contextName, outgoing management target information, and the request-id contained in the received PDU (the proxy forwarder must extract the request-id for this purpose). If an appropriate cache entry cannot be found, processing of the response is halted. Otherwise:
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 使用processResponsePdu接口接收传入响应。代理转发器使用接收到的参数在其缓存中查找未决转发请求的条目。这是通过将接收到的参数与sendPduHandle、contextEngineID、contextName、传出管理目标信息和接收到的PDU中包含的请求id的缓存值相匹配来完成的（为此，代理转发器必须提取请求id）。如果找不到适当的缓存项，则响应的处理将停止。否则：

contents.text: (2) The cache information is extracted, and removed from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 将提取缓存信息，并将其从缓存中删除。

contents.text: (3) A new Response PDU is constructed, using the request-id value from the original forwarded request (as extracted from the cache). All other values are identical to those in the received Response PDU.
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 使用原始转发请求（从缓存中提取）中的请求id值构造新的响应PDU。所有其他值与接收到的响应PDU中的值相同。

contents.text: (4) If the incoming SNMP version is SNMPv1 and the outgoing SNMP version is SNMPv2 or SNMPv3, the proxy forwarder must apply the translation rules documented in [RFC1908].
contents.zh-CHS: (4) 如果传入的SNMP版本为SNMPv1，而传出的SNMP版本为SNMPv2或SNMPv3，则代理转发器必须应用[RFC1908]中记录的转换规则。

contents.text: (5) The proxy forwarder calls the Dispatcher using the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface. Parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: (5) 代理转发器使用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口调用调度程序。参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel indicates the Message Processing Model by which the original incoming message was processed.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel表示处理原始传入消息的消息处理模型。

contents.text: - The securityModel is that of the original incoming management target extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是从缓存中提取的原始传入管理目标的模型。

contents.text: - The securityName is that of the original incoming management target extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是从缓存中提取的原始传入管理目标的名称。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is that of the original incoming management target extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是从缓存中提取的原始传入管理目标的级别。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是从缓存中提取的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是从缓存中提取的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU to be returned.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示要返回的PDU版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the (possibly translated) Response PDU.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是（可能翻译的）响应PDU。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the value extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是从缓存中提取的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates that no error occurred and that a Response PDU message should be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: - statusInformation表示未发生错误，应生成响应PDU消息。

contents.text: 3.5.1.3. Processing an Incoming Report Indication
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.1.3. 处理传入报告指示

contents.text: A proxy forwarder follows the following procedure when an incoming report indication is received:
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到传入报告指示时，代理转发器遵循以下程序：

contents.text: (1) The incoming report indication is received using the processResponsePdu interface. The proxy forwarder uses the received parameters to locate an entry in its cache of pending forwarded requests. This is done by matching the received parameters with the cached values of sendPduHandle. If an appropriate cache entry cannot be found, processing of the report indication is halted. Otherwise:
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 使用processResponsePdu接口接收传入报告指示。代理转发器使用接收到的参数在其缓存中查找未决转发请求的条目。这是通过将接收到的参数与sendPduHandle的缓存值进行匹配来实现的。如果找不到适当的缓存项，则报告指示的处理将停止。否则：

contents.text: (2) The cache information is extracted, and removed from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 将提取缓存信息，并将其从缓存中删除。

contents.text: (3) If the original incoming management target information indicates SNMPv1, processing of the report indication is halted.
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 如果原始传入的管理目标信息指示SNMPv1，则报告指示的处理将停止。

contents.text: (4) The proxy forwarder calls the Dispatcher using the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface. Parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: (4) 代理转发器使用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口调用调度程序。参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel indicates the Message Processing Model by which the original incoming message was processed.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel表示处理原始传入消息的消息处理模型。

contents.text: - The securityModel is that of the original incoming management target extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是从缓存中提取的原始传入管理目标的模型。

contents.text: - The securityName is that of the original incoming management target extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是从缓存中提取的原始传入管理目标的名称。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is that of the original incoming management target extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是从缓存中提取的原始传入管理目标的级别。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the value extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是从缓存中提取的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the value extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是从缓存中提取的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU to be returned.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本指示要返回的PDU版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is unused.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU未使用。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the value extracted from the cache.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是从缓存中提取的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation contain the contextEngineID, contextName, counter OID, and counter value received in the report indication.
contents.zh-CHS: - 状态信息包含报告指示中接收的contextEngineID、contextName、计数器OID和计数器值。

contents.text: 3.5.2. Notification Forwarding
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.2. 通知转发

contents.text: A proxy forwarder receives notifications in the same manner as a notification receiver application, using the processPdu abstract service interface. The following procedure is used when a notification is received:
contents.zh-CHS: 代理转发器使用processPdu抽象服务接口以与通知接收器应用程序相同的方式接收通知。收到通知时使用以下程序：

contents.text: (1) The incoming management target information received from the processPdu interface is translated into outgoing management target information. Note that this translation may vary for different values of contextEngineId and/or contextName. The translation may result in multiple management targets.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 从processPdu接口接收的传入管理目标信息被转换为传出管理目标信息。请注意，此转换可能因contextEngineId和/或contextName的不同值而不同。翻译可能导致多个管理目标。

contents.text: (2) If appropriate outgoing management target information cannot be found and the notification was a Trap, processing of the notification is halted. If appropriate outgoing management target information cannot be found and the notification was an Inform, the proxy forwarder increments the snmpProxyDrops object, and calls the Dispatcher using the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 如果找不到适当的传出管理目标信息，并且通知是陷阱，则停止处理通知。如果找不到适当的传出管理目标信息，并且通知是通知，则代理转发器将递增snmpProxyDrops对象，并使用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口调用调度程序。

contents.text: The parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: 参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - pduVersion是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The PDU is an undefined and unused value.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是一个未定义且未使用的值。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是接收到的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates that an error occurred and that a Report message should be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: - statusInformation表示发生了错误，应生成报告消息。

contents.text: Processing of the message stops at this point. Otherwise,
contents.zh-CHS: 消息的处理在此点停止。否则

contents.text: (3) The proxy forwarder generates a notification using the procedures described in the preceding section on Notification Originators, with the following exceptions:
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 代理转发器使用上一节关于通知发起人的程序生成通知，但以下例外情况除外：

contents.text: - The contextEngineID and contextName values from the original received notification are used.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将使用原始收到的通知中的contextEngineID和contextName值。

contents.text: - The outgoing management targets previously determined are used.
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用先前确定的传出管理目标。

contents.text: - No filtering mechanisms are applied.
contents.zh-CHS: - 没有应用过滤机制。

contents.text: - The variable-bindings from the original received notification are used, rather than retrieving variable-bindings from local MIB instrumentation. In particular, no access-control is applied to these variable-bindings.
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用原始接收到的通知中的变量绑定，而不是从本地MIB检测中检索变量绑定。特别是，没有对这些变量绑定应用访问控制。

contents.text: - If for any of the outgoing management targets, the incoming SNMP version is SNMPv1 and the outgoing SNMP version is SNMPv2 or SNMPv3, the proxy forwarder must apply the translation rules as documented in [RFC1908].
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果对于任何传出管理目标，传入SNMP版本为SNMPv1，传出SNMP版本为SNMPv2或SNMPv3，则代理转发器必须应用[RFC1908]中记录的转换规则。

contents.text: - If for any of the outgoing management targets, the incoming SNMP version is SNMPv2 or SNMPv3, and the outgoing SNMP version is SNMPv1, this outgoing management target is not used when generating the forwarded notifications.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果对于任何传出管理目标，传入SNMP版本为SNMPv2或SNMPv3，传出SNMP版本为SNMPv1，则在生成转发通知时不使用此传出管理目标。

contents.text: (4) If the original received notification contains an SNMPv2-Trap PDU, processing of the notification is now completed. Otherwise, the original received notification must contain an Inform PDU, and processing continues.
contents.zh-CHS: (4) 如果原始接收到的通知包含SNMPv2陷阱PDU，则通知的处理现在完成。否则，原始收到的通知必须包含Inform PDU，并且处理将继续。

contents.text: (5) If the forwarded notifications included any Inform PDUs, processing continues when the procedures described in the section for Notification Originators determine that either:
contents.zh-CHS: (5) 如果转发的通知包含任何通知PDU，则当通知发起人章节中描述的程序确定：

contents.text: - None of the generated notifications containing Inform PDUs have been successfully acknowledged within the longest of the time intervals, in which case processing of the original notification is halted, or,
contents.zh-CHS: - 在最长的时间间隔内，未成功确认生成的包含Inform PDU的通知，在这种情况下，原始通知的处理会停止，或者，

contents.text: - At least one of the generated notifications containing Inform PDUs is successfully acknowledged, in which case a response to the original received notification containing an Inform PDU is generated as described in the following steps.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功确认包含Inform PDU的至少一个生成的通知，在这种情况下，按照以下步骤中所述生成对包含Inform PDU的原始接收通知的响应。

contents.text: (6) A Response PDU is constructed, using the values of request-id and variable-bindings from the original received Inform PDU, and error-status and error-index values of 0.
contents.zh-CHS: (6) 使用来自原始接收的Inform PDU的请求id和变量绑定值，以及错误状态和错误索引值0，构造响应PDU。

contents.text: (7) The Dispatcher is called using the returnResponsePdu abstract service interface. Parameters are:
contents.zh-CHS: (7) 使用returnResponsePdu抽象服务接口调用调度程序。参数包括：

contents.text: - The messageProcessingModel is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - messageProcessingModel是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The securityModel is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityModel是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The securityName is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityName是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The securityLevel is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - securityLevel是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The contextEngineID is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextEngineID是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The contextName is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - contextName是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The pduVersion indicates the version of the PDU constructed in step (6) above.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU版本表示在上述步骤（6）中构造的PDU的版本。

contents.text: - The PDU is the value constructed in step (6) above.
contents.zh-CHS: - PDU是在上述步骤（6）中构造的值。

contents.text: - The maxSizeResponseScopedPDU is a local value indicating the maximum size of a ScopedPDU that the application can accept.
contents.zh-CHS: - maxSizeResponseScopedPDU是一个本地值，指示应用程序可以接受的ScopedPDU的最大大小。

contents.text: - The stateReference is the originally received value.
contents.zh-CHS: - stateReference是最初收到的值。

contents.text: - The statusInformation indicates that no error occurred and that a Response PDU message should be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: - statusInformation表示未发生错误，应生成响应PDU消息。

contents.text: 4. The Structure of the MIB Modules
contents.zh-CHS: 4. MIB模块的结构

contents.text: There are three separate MIB modules described in this document, the management target MIB, the notification MIB, and the proxy MIB. The following sections describe the structure of these three MIB modules.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中描述了三个独立的MIB模块：管理目标MIB、通知MIB和代理MIB。以下各节介绍这三个MIB模块的结构。

contents.text: The use of these MIBs by particular types of applications is described later in this document:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档后面将介绍特定类型应用程序对这些MIB的使用：

contents.text: - The use of the management target MIB and the notification MIB in notification originator applications is described in section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: - 第6节介绍了在通知发起人应用程序中使用管理目标MIB和通知MIB。

contents.text: - The use of the notification MIB for filtering notifications in notification originator applications is described in section 7.
contents.zh-CHS: - 第7节介绍了使用通知MIB过滤通知发起人应用程序中的通知。

contents.text: - The use of the management target MIB and the proxy MIB in proxy forwarding applications is described in section 8.
contents.zh-CHS: - 第8节描述了管理目标MIB和代理MIB在代理转发应用程序中的使用。

contents.text: 4.1. The Management Target MIB Module
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 管理目标MIB模块

contents.text: The SNMP-TARGET-MIB module contains objects for defining management targets. It consists of two tables and conformance/compliance statements.
contents.zh-CHS: SNMP-TARGET-MIB模块包含用于定义管理目标的对象。它由两个表和一致性/一致性声明组成。

contents.text: The first table, the snmpTargetAddrTable, contains information about transport domains and addresses. It also contains an object, snmpTargetAddrTagList, which provides a mechanism for grouping entries.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个表SNMPTargetADRDR表包含有关传输域和地址的信息。它还包含一个对象snmpTargetAddrTagList，它提供了一种对条目进行分组的机制。

contents.text: The second table, the snmpTargetParamsTable, contains information about SNMP version and security information to be used when sending messages to particular transport domains and addresses.
contents.zh-CHS: 第二个表snmpTargetParamsTable包含有关SNMP版本的信息以及向特定传输域和地址发送消息时要使用的安全信息。

contents.text: 4.1.1. Tag Lists
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1.1. 标记列表

contents.text: The snmpTargetAddrTagList object is used for grouping entries in the snmpTargetAddrTable. The value of this object contains a list of tag values which are used to select target addresses to be used for a particular operation.
contents.zh-CHS: SNMPTargetADRDTagList对象用于对SNMPTargetADRDR表中的条目进行分组。此对象的值包含一个标记值列表，用于选择要用于特定操作的目标地址。

contents.text: A tag value, which may also be used in MIB objects other than snmpTargetAddrTagList, is an arbitrary string of octets, but may not contain a delimiter character. Delimiter characters are defined to be one of the following characters:
contents.zh-CHS: 标记值（也可用于SNMPTargetADRDTagList以外的MIB对象）是八位字节的任意字符串，但不能包含分隔符字符。分隔符字符定义为以下字符之一：

contents.text: - An ASCII space character (0x20).
contents.zh-CHS: - ASCII空格字符（0x20）。

contents.text: - An ASCII TAB character (0x09).
contents.zh-CHS: - ASCII制表符（0x09）。

contents.text: - An ASCII carriage return (CR) character (0x0D).
contents.zh-CHS: - ASCII回车（CR）字符（0x0D）。

contents.text: - An ASCII line feed (LF) character (0x0B).
contents.zh-CHS: - ASCII换行符（LF）字符（0x0B）。

contents.text: In addition, a tag value may not have a zero length. Generally, a particular MIB object may contain either
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，标记值的长度不能为零。通常，特定的MIB对象可能包含

contents.text: - a single tag value, in which case the value of the MIB object may not contain a delimiter character, or:
contents.zh-CHS: - 单个标记值，在这种情况下，MIB对象的值可能不包含分隔符，或者：

contents.text: - a MIB object may contain a list of tag values, separated by single delimiter characters.
contents.zh-CHS: - MIB对象可能包含由单个分隔符分隔的标记值列表。

contents.text: For a list of tag values, these constraints imply certain restrictions on the value of a MIB object:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于标记值列表，这些约束意味着对MIB对象值的某些限制：

contents.text: - There cannot be a leading or trailing delimiter character.
contents.zh-CHS: - 不能有前导或尾随分隔符字符。

contents.text: - There cannot be multiple adjacent delimiter charaters.
contents.zh-CHS: - 不能有多个相邻的分隔符字符。

contents.text: 4.1.2. Definitions
SNMP-TARGET-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN
IMPORTS TEXTUAL-CONVENTION, MODULE-IDENTITY, OBJECT-TYPE,
contents.zh-CHS: 导入文本约定、模块标识、对象类型、，

contents.text: snmpModules, Integer32 FROM SNMPv2-SMI
contents.zh-CHS: SNMPv2 SMI中的snmpModules、Integer32

contents.text: TDomain, TAddress, TimeInterval, RowStatus, StorageType, TestAndIncr FROM SNMPv2-TC SnmpSecurityModel, SnmpMessageProcessingModel, SnmpSecurityLevel, SnmpAdminString FROM SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 来自SNMPv2 TC SnmpSecurityModel的TDomain、TAddress、TimeInterval、RowStatus、StorageType、TestAndIncr、来自SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB的SnmpMessageProcessingModel、SnmpSecurityLevel、SNMPAdministring

contents.text: OBJECT-GROUP FROM SNMPv2-CONF;
contents.zh-CHS: snmpv2conf中的对象组；
